Returns:

Check if the given data is a GIF.

Parameters:

data (bytes): The data to check.

Returns:

True if the data is a GIF, False otherwise.

Returns:

lefi.utils.search module

find(iterable: Iterable[lefi.utils.search.T], check: Callable[[lefi.utils.search.T], bool]) → Optional[Union[lefi.utils.search.T, List[lefi.utils.search.T]]]

Finds the item in the iterable that matches the check.

Parameters:

iterable: The iterable to search on. check: The check to use for filtering.

Returns:

The item (or a list of items) that match the check.

Finds the item in the iterable that matches the attributes.

Returns:

The attributes found.
